thread.title: Armed police dealing with incident at Cardiff bank
thread.title_full: Armed police dealing with incident at Cardiff bank | Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Armed police dealing with incident at Cardiff bank
text:
The police operation on Cowbridge Road East in Cardiff is ongoing Credit: Garan Thomas South Wales Police says it is responding to "an incident" on Cowbridge Road East in Cardiff with armed officers.
Police were called at around 4pm on Monday. Credit: Garan Thomas Police were called out just before 4pm on Monday. Eyewitnesses say the officers went into the Lloyd's Bank.
A South Wales Police spokesperson told ITV News, "firearms officers were deployed to the area to ensure the safety of the public and officers at the scene."
A police helicopter was also seen circling the area.
The incident is ongoing.
Last updated Mon 13 Feb 2017 Read more 2 updates Bank offers reward for information after robbery at Cardiff branch Wales Cardiff
